name: My Sticker Book (itch)
description:
A little puzzle solving  game about a little girl and her fairy tale story sticker book. 

This is the first day the little girl sleeps on her own.

She wakes up at night and wants some water.

"But what if there are monsters hiding everywhere in the house?" She wonders.

-About this game-

There is no dialogue in this game.

*This game contains a little bit of horror contents and jump scares. (Really a little bit though. Can be expected that it's not scary overall)

It's a very short game that  only takes roughly 10min to play, but hope you have fun! :D (There is no save function) 

Mouse: drag stickers

a/d: move

space: jump

Alt+F4: close game

For $3 or more, you will get an extra pack including the following contents: 

The game's original sound tracks

 6 small chat stickers that are not included in the game

5 wallpapers (1920 x 1080 px)

The game is also available on Steam, where you can obtain the exactly same contents as well.
